body:
As promised, this second PR will update the libabigail package to be able to install from source! I also figured out how to do the whole thing without needing the patch (libdwarf actually comes from elfutils and was erroneously added).

ping @alalazo !

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: Updating libabigail to support source install
